title: Update documentation for new UI architecture
description:
Update documentation to reflect Lit/Shoelace migration:

1. Update README.md:
   - New UI development setup instructions
   - pnpm commands for dev/build
   - Component architecture overview

2. Create internal/tickboard/ui/README.md:
   - Component hierarchy diagram
   - How to add new components
   - Theming customization guide
   - Shoelace components used

3. Update any existing tickboard docs:
   - Remove references to old static files
   - Add new file structure

4. Add inline code comments:
   - JSDoc for public component APIs
   - Complex logic explanations

Test: Follow README to set up dev environment from scratch
acceptance_criteria: README allows new developer to set up and run UI, component docs are accurate and helpful
